title: Plat 4 smurfing on my gold 5 account READ BELOW 65% WIN RATE
body:
add xxboomninja if you have a good win rate and want some easy lp http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=xxboomninja

GOOD WIN RATES ONLY

replies.body: im silver 4 and was high silver last season only did placements and a few games. Got reset to bronze 4 and am already silver 4.

>

"already" you're 200 games in.
I climb a division every 2 days.
